artist: Artist: Christine Shea , et al.; Author: Wendy-O Matik; Publisher: Defiant Times Press, Oakland
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic text and illustration of female singer printed on orange wove paper covers; 20 pp.
inscription: Title page, black ink pen: For Fly, / More words / from the / fury of mind, / the breath of my time, / + the heart of my / tongue. / (heart) / Love You! / Wendy-O / 3/04
title: Wendy-O Matik: Unleashed!
